Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-lad
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: niṅṅaḷuṭe puruṣasantānaṅṅaḷe aṟukeāla ceytukeāṇṭuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe strījanaṅṅaḷe jīvikkān viṭṭukeāṇṭuṁ niṅṅaḷkk niṣ‌ṭhūra marddanamēlpiccukeāṇṭirunna phir'aunṟekūṭṭaril ninn niṅṅaḷe nāṁ rakṣappeṭuttiya sandarbhaṁ (ōrmikkuka.) niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkalninnuḷḷa oru valiya parīkṣaṇamāṇ atiluṇṭāyirunnat‌
kaṭal piḷarnn niṅṅaḷe keāṇṭu pēāyi nāṁ rakṣappeṭuttukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷ kaṇṭukeāṇṭirikke phir'aunṟekūṭṭare nāṁ mukkikkeāllukayuṁ ceyta sandarbhavuṁ (ōrmikkuka)
mūsā nabikk nālpat rāvukaḷ nāṁ niścayikkukayuṁ addēhaṁ (atinnāyi) pēāya śēṣaṁ niṅṅaḷ akramamāyi oru kāḷakkuṭṭiye (daivamāyi) svīkarikkukayuṁ ceyta sandarbhavuṁ (ōrkkuka)
enniṭṭ atinn śēṣavuṁ niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ māppunalki. niṅṅaḷ nandiyuḷḷavarāyirikkuvān vēṇṭi
niṅṅaḷ sanmārgaṁ kaṇṭettunnatin vēṇṭi vēda granthavuṁ, satyavuṁ asatyavuṁ vērtirikkunna pramāṇavuṁ mūsānabikk nāṁ nalkiya sandarbhavuṁ (ōrkkuka)

enṟesamudāyamē, kāḷakkuṭṭiye (daivamāyi) svīkariccat mukhēna niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷēāṭ tanne an'yāyaṁ ceytirikkukayāṇ‌. atināl niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe sraṣṭāvilēkk paścāttapicc maṭaṅṅukayuṁ (prāyaścittamāyi) niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷetanne nigrahikkukayuṁ ceyyuka. niṅṅaḷuṭe sraṣṭāvinṟe'aṭukkal atāṇ niṅṅaḷkk guṇakaraṁ enn mūsā tanṟejanatayēāṭ paṟañña sandarbhavuṁ (ōrmikkuka). anantaraṁ allāhu niṅṅaḷuṭe paścāttāpaṁ svīkariccu. avan paścāttāpaṁ ēṟe svīkarikkunnavanuṁ karuṇānidhiyumatre
ō; mūsā, ñaṅṅaḷ allāhuve pratyakṣamāyi kāṇunnat vare tāṅkaḷe ñaṅṅaḷ viśvasikkukayē illa enn niṅṅaḷ paṟañña sandarbhaṁ (ōrkkuka.) tannimittaṁ niṅṅaḷ nēākki nilkke iṭittī niṅṅaḷe piṭikūṭi
pinnīṭ niṅṅaḷuṭe maraṇattin śēṣaṁ niṅṅaḷe nāṁ eḻunnēlpiccu. niṅṅaḷ nandiyuḷḷavarāyittīrān vēṇṭi

niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ mēghattaṇal nalkukayuṁ mannāyuṁ kāṭapakṣikaḷuṁ iṟakkittarikayuṁ ceytu. niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ nalkiyiṭṭuḷḷa viśiṣṭamāya vastukkaḷil ninn bhakṣiccukeāḷḷuka (enn nāṁ nirdēśiccu). avar (enniṭṭuṁ nandikēṭ kāṇiccavar) namukkeāru drēāhavuṁ varuttiyiṭṭilla. avar avarkk tanneyāṇ drēāhamuṇṭākkikkeāṇṭirikkunnat‌
